name: Anti-Air Battery
description: Once per mission, you can destroy any flying target smaller than a station on Farivius.

name: Gungnir, Lævateinn, Mjölnir Reinforcements
description: Once per mission, you may call in a 1 Structure/Stress NPC of these 3. They leave once losing either Structure or Stress.

name: 6 PC Reinforcements
description: You may call in any PC to help you, including the GM's. They may drop within 2 range of any ally, and if they land on something, deal 5 AP damage to both.

name: Factory
description: Once per mission, you can make a fitting reserve of choice. Tsuchinoko has priority pick.
